description: This file contains the DateUtils object providing date-related utilities for formatting, parsing, and navigating months in a Kotlin-based Android app, with specific focus on locale-aware formatting and compatibility with pre-java.time APIs.

classes.name: DateUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing date utilities such as formatting month identifiers, converting between date formats, and navigating months, designed for Android compatibility without using java.time APIs.

methods.name: currentMonthId
methods.description: Returns the current month as a string in 'yyyy-MM' format, defaulting to the current date.

methods.name: formatMonthLabel
methods.description: Converts a 'yyyy-MM' string to a localized label like 'Mar/2025' with proper capitalization.

methods.name: getNextMonth
methods.description: Calculates the next month identifier following the given 'yyyy-MM' string.

methods.name: getPreviousMonth
methods.description: Calculates the previous month identifier based on the given 'yyyy-MM' string.

methods.name: isSameMonth
methods.description: Checks if an ISO date string is in the same month as a specified 'yyyy-MM' currentMonth.

methods.name: parseIsoDate
methods.description: Parses an ISO date string ('yyyy-MM-dd') into a Date object, returning null if invalid.

methods.name: formatIsoDate
methods.description: Formats a Date object into an ISO date string ('yyyy-MM-dd').
